extendedInfo.description: Running 26.2 miles is no small feat for even the greatest of athletes. It takes an incredible amount of endurance, drive, mental toughness, and full body fitness to be able to cross the marathon finish line after running for such a long time. With beginner, intermediate, competitive, advanced, and elite marathon training regimens, there are no limits to your progress in training. Our marathon training exercises help you achieve goals that are realistic, working towards bigger and better personal running records.Endurance will skyrocket and youâll be well on your way with our training guidance. Completing a marathon is not as far out of reach as you may think, as long as you take our guidance and dedicate yourself to the running program. Elite athleticism isnât unattainable! All you have to do is follow the plan we have laid out for you!Includes:-	15 levels of marathon training to challenge you and lead you through improvement!-	In-depth descriptions of training exercises to insure running success!
